channel.title: ~Project Uber~ Recruitment
channel.description:
[b][i]Project Uber[/i][/b] [b]Welcome to Project Uber's recruitment page![/b]
[b]I am wanting to create a server, which will have these things:[/b] [i]All skills working; Have a GREAT cache for the client to have (higher then 377); Have [b]AS FEW GLITCHES AS POSSIBLE[/b] in the game; Many more, but thats all for now![/i]
If you would like to join on Project Uber, paste this into your post: Name: What you want to apply for: (coder, forum mod, tester) Experience: Extra info:
I will be having the following: 5 forum mods (maybe less) 5 testers As many coders as posible, but no more then 15 for the client....maybe less Bout 10 coders on the server......maybe less....
If you chose to join, register on our forums [url=http://projectuber.smfforfree3.com/index.php]here![/url]
Server Coders: Me (OWNER 2007)
Client Coders:
Testers:
Forum Mods: soul raever #A-M
Declined:

item.title: ~Project Uber~ Recruitment

@OWNER_2007 wrote:

Project Uber
Welcome to Project Uber’s recruitment page!

I am wanting to create a server, which will have these things:
All skills working;
Have a GREAT cache for the client to have (higher then 377);
Have AS FEW GLITCHES AS POSSIBLE in the game;
Many more, but thats all for now!

If you would like to join on Project Uber, paste this into your post:
Name:
What you want to apply for: (coder, forum mod, tester)
Experience:
Extra info:

I will be having the following:
5 forum mods (maybe less)
5 testers
As many coders as posible, but no more then 15 for the client…maybe less
Bout 10 coders on the server…maybe less…

If you chose to join, register on our forums here!
